name: Latino Network
address: Multiple locations, including 1600 NE 2nd Ave, Portland, OR 97232 (This is a general address for their services, specific program locations may vary)

name: Puentes (Central City Concern)

name: Oregon Latino Health Coalition (OLHC)
address: 245 S Bancroft Street, Suite E, Portland, OR 97212
description: Works to advance the health of Latinos through policy, advocacy, and prevention, and can help people gain access to health services, including mental health support. They are involved with the Latinx Emotional Health Collaborative

description: Offers a Community Mental Health program that supports Lane County's Latine communities with culturally specific counseling, substance use, and social service programs
